#### Boxplots

<br>

* performance metric in short (1-5 years), medium (6-10 years), and long-term (11-21 years) 
* each HCR is a different colored boxplot
* box is constructed with the interquartile range: 25th percentile, median, and 75th percentile
* whiskers represent the smallest and largest values within 1.5 times the interquartile range
